</style>

<!-- SAP Brand Colors CSS Variables -->
<style type="text/css">
:root {
  --sap-blue-primary: #0070F2;
  --sap-blue-secondary: #1B90FF;
  --sap-blue-dark: #002A86;
  --sap-blue-darkest: #00144A;
  --sap-white: #FFFFFF;
  --sap-gray-light: #F8FAFC;
  --sap-gray-medium: #64748B;
  --sap-gray-border: #E2E8F0;
}

/* SAP Email Header Styling */
.sap-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--sap-blue-primary) 0%, var(--sap-blue-dark) 100%);
  padding: 20px 0;
}

.sap-logo-container {
  background-color: var(--sap-white);
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 112, 242, 0.15);
}

.sap-title-text {
  font-family: "SAP 72", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif;
  color: var(--sap-blue-darkest);
  font-weight: 300;
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
}

.sap-title-accent {
  color: var(--sap-blue-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.sap-subtitle {
  font-family: "SAP 72", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif;
  color: var(--sap-gray-medium);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.sap-separator {
  height: 1px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 0%, var(--sap-gray-border) 50%, transparent 100%);
  margin: 15px 40px 0 40px;
}
</style>
